text: Isa vica ko'i papa nahim_ki tusim apane raba da fazala (kirapa) talasa karom. Phira jadom tusim loka “araphata”tom vapisa hovo tam alaha nu masa'are-e-harama de nere yada karo ate usa nu yada karo jisa tar'ham alaha ne tuhanu dasi'a hai isa tom pahilam nisacita hi' tusim bhatake ho'e lokam vicom si
